name: ILEVIASMARTHOME
0:
”Alexa, turn on spotlight”
”Alexa, set floor lamp at 10 percent”
”Alexa, turn on Goodbye”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Add Alexa to your smart building to speed up your control experience and make your life more comfortable. Simple and intuitive voice commands activate scenes and allow you to control individual or groups of devices.

Start by requesting assistance from your EVE installer, who selects which devices are exposed to Alexa, renames the devices and scenes to your liking and sets up a list of voice commands that you can use with your EVE system.

The ILEVIA SMART HOME skill supports Alexa's complete set of voice commands for controlling lights, switches and scenes.

You can take control of your building a step further with complete scenes. For example, in addition to lights and switches, you can add roller shutter control, audio, video and much more.
